text: Yakhana kaphirara tadera antare posana karechila gotriya ahamika --- ajnatara yugera ahamika [1], takhana allahâ€Œ tamra rasula o muminadera upara sbiya prasanti nayila karalena; ara taderake taka'oyara kalemaya [2] sudrrha karalena, ara tara'i chila era adhikatara yogya o upayukta. Ara allahâ€Œ sabakichu samparke sarbajna
